## Loading data
```{r}
file_path = "~/Desktop/datasets_UCI/yeast/ds_0.05.csv" 
dataset = read.csv(file_path, header=T)

x_data = dataset[,-ncol(dataset)]
y_data = dataset[,ncol(dataset)]
```


#Tuning

## Random Forest c/ Accuracy
```{r}
control = trainControl(method="repeatedcv", number=10, repeats=3, search="grid", classProbs = T)

tunegrid = expand.grid(.mtry=c(1:15))

rf_gridsearch = train(x=x_data, y=as.factor(y_data), method="parRF", metric="Accuracy", tuneGrid=tunegrid, trControl=control)

print(rf_gridsearch)
plot(rf_gridsearch)

#MÃ©trica maxima
max(rf_gridsearch$results['Accuracy'])
```
